exerciseList.description: Write down 3 things you appreciate from today
Get some exercise, without your phone, and focus on the physical sensations
De-clutter part of your house or office desk, helping the mind to feel calmer and clearer
Take 20 deep breaths; inhale through nose, exhale with mouth
Every time your phone vibrates today, pause and take one breath
Follow along with a guided meditation on Youtube
Walk for 10 minutes today, without your phone, focused on your surroundings
Notice the sensation as you change posture today from sitting to standing or standing to sitting
Eat one meal alone, without any distractions at all, focusing just on the tastes and smells
Listen to a favourite piece of music
Drink a mindful cup of tea or coffee
Pick up a good book and read it while lounging in a comfortable spot
